segments.text: Tell me a little bit about yourself , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Steven and I live in Beijing . I was born in 1980 . I have graduated from Peking University . I majored in business administration .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of jobs have you had ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been a production manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to tell me something about your outstanding achievements ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I introduced an advanced product line , which increased the output and lessened the cost .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What special skills do you have , can you tell me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have experience in computer operation , proficiency in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know in your resume that you have worked in your present company for 3 years . Can you tell me why you want to leave your present job and join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because the job I am doing in my present company is of no challenge , but I like challenge . Your firm is a young organization with many innovative ideas . It has been very successful in expanding market since its establishment 10 years ago . Working for you would be exactly the sort of challenge I am looking for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think our interview is complete then . We will give you a call in ten days or so .
segments.speaker: S1
